                  GreeneStreet Films(2007). Length : 84min                    


 In "Awake," a psychological thriller that tells the story of a man           
 undergoing heart surgery while experiencing a phenomenon called "anesthetic  
 awareness," which leaves him awake but paralyzed throughout the operation.   
 As various obstacles present themselves, his wife must make life-altering    
 decisions while wrestling with her own personal drama.
